Package com.concordium.sdk.responses.blockcertificates

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockCertificates
    Certificates for a block for protocols supporting ConcordiumBFT.
    BlockCertificates.BlockCertificatesBuilder  
    EpochFinalizationEntry
    The epoch finalization entry is the proof that makes the protocol able to advance to a new epoch.
    EpochFinalizationEntry.EpochFinalizationEntryBuilder  
    FinalizerRound
    The finalizer round is a map from a Round to the list of finalizers (identified by their BakerId) that signed off the round.
    FinalizerRound.FinalizerRoundBuilder  
    QuorumCertificate
    A quorum certificate is the certificate that the finalization committee issues in order to certify a block.
    QuorumCertificate.QuorumCertificateBuilder  
    QuorumSignature
    The signature of a QuorumCertificate.
    QuorumSignature.QuorumSignatureBuilder  
    SuccessorProof
    A proof that establishes that the successor block of a EpochFinalizationEntry is the immediate successor of the finalized block.
    SuccessorProof.SuccessorProofBuilder  
    TimeoutCertificate
    A timeout certificate is the certificate that the finalization committee issues when a round times out, thus making it possible for the protocol to proceed to the next round.
    TimeoutCertificate.TimeoutCertificateBuilder  
    TimeoutSignature
    The signature of a TimeoutCertificate.
    TimeoutSignature.TimeoutSignatureBuilder
